{{Infobox Berry |name = #60 Liechi |image = [[File:Liechi.png]] |caption = This Berry is surrounded by mystery. It is rumored to be imbued with the power of the sea. |growtime = 2d |harvest = 0.5 berries |replant = 0% |points = 10,000 |flavor =
*30 spicy *10 dry *30 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} == Description == '''Liechi''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least one empty plot and at least 23 ripe [[Passho]] on the field. Pokemon #382 Kyogre must have been caught to unlock this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 6 hours || 12 hours || 1 day || 2 days - 4 days |- ! Animation | [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:LiechiTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:LiechiTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:LiechiTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 2 days -
4 days || --- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 1 day 8 hours -
2 days 16 hours || 384 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 21 hours 20 mins -
42 hours 40 mins || 256 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[Farm]] in following way to obtain this berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | || style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Passho.png|30px]]
